formalpara.title: Interner Hilfetext zu diesem AMI-Befehl in Asterisk 1.6:

para.screen: Action: Bridge Synopsis: Bridge two channels already in the PBX Privilege: call,all Description: Bridge together two channels already in the PBX Variables: ( Headers marked with * are required ) *Channel1: Channel to Bridge to Channel2 *Channel2: Channel to Bridge to Channel1 Tone: (Yes|No) Play courtesy tone to Channel 2

formalpara.title: Differenz des internen Hilfetexts von Asterisk 1.4 zu 1.6:
